actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-33.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of and waiving certain points of order against H.R. 3512, making supplemental and further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1981, rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3512 (continuing appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of and waiving certain points of order against H.R. 3512, making supplemental and further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1981, rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes.
